attributes.action: Raise the tax free allowance on Redundancy pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this government wishes to help people who are being made redundant, it's about time the tax free part of redundancy was raised, to the best of my knowledge it has been £30,000 since at least 1986. This is a totally unjust situation. Why has it not been increased? A tax on the unemployed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
